title: This splash art is a work of art!
body:
Hi everyone, I'm a summoner who has been here since a few seasons ago.  Well today I was reborn with a new account (I got bored of the Main and wanted to start again).  Today I am here to give my opinion about the new splash art of Demonic Tristana.

https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/05/00_T2_Image_ic47eweitcbsinwyn612.jpg

I have seen the great evolution that the Riot art & music team has had and I have to admit that I am surprised how they have had that breakthrough in art.  To be honest, what I love most about Riot is the team that is in charge of the illustrations.  That way of demonstrating the identity of a character or skin is just amazing and although I'm not a tristana player (I've never liked being Adc, I've always been more of Mid & JG because I love being contributing something to the game) even so this  splash art is among my favorites definitely Jennifer Wuestling is one of the best illustrators and I have to admit that she has some very good knowledge about Graphic Design that she gives them to notice in her works

At the end of the day it is a tristana skin, they usually look very much alike, although the detail that I wanted to highlight about this is that I loved the work that the illustrator did in it, in itself as I have seen the evolution of the illustration team since  The first splash art took me by surprise and it also gave me that feeling of being grateful for how they have worked so hard  Even so, I know that not everyone will share my opinion on the subject and I respect them for giving their point of view since finally and after I wrote this was to be able to share my opinion and see those of others {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
